Rautoml 1.0.0.0
  • Reference

    Custom Histogram Plot

    custom_histogram.Rd

    Creates a histogram with optional density overlay and customization options.

    custom_histogram(
  df,
  variable,
  bin_width = 10,
  title = NULL,
  xlab = NULL,
  ylab = NULL,
  density_only = FALSE,
  fill_color = "#0077B6",
  border_color = "white",
  overlayDensisty = FALSE,
  plot_title = NULL,
  axis_text_size = 18,
  axis_title_size = 24,
  title_size = 28,
  axistext_angle = 0,
  title_pos = 0.5
)

    Arguments

    df

    A data frame containing the variable to plot.

    variable

    The name of the variable to be plotted.

    bin_width

    The width of histogram bins. Defaults to 10.

    title

    The title of the plot (deprecated, use plot_title instead).

    xlab

    Label for the x-axis.

    ylab

    Label for the y-axis.

    density_only

    Logical, if TRUE, plots only the density curve.

    fill_color

    The fill color of the histogram bars. Defaults to "#0077B6".

    border_color

    The border color of the histogram bars. Defaults to "white".

    overlayDensisty

    Logical, if TRUE, overlays a density plot on the histogram.

    plot_title

    Title of the plot.

    axis_text_size

    Size of the axis text. Defaults to 18.

    axis_title_size

    Size of the axis titles. Defaults to 24.

    title_size

    Size of the plot title. Defaults to 28.

    axistext_angle

    Angle of x-axis text labels. Defaults to 0.

    title_pos

    Horizontal position of the title (0 to 1). Defaults to 0.5.

    Value

    A ggplot2 object representing the histogram.
